```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

symbioR is a toolkit of functions to tidy and visualise ITS2 sequence profiles for Symbiodiniaceae.

to install:

```{r class.source = 'fold-show', include=TRUE, eval=FALSE}

remotes::install_github("symbiobase/symbioR")

```
